title: Probabilistic Graphical Models: Principles and Techniques
author: Daphne Koller, Nir Friedman
comment: Essential reading for understanding the foundations of my work with SageNet.

title: Deep Learning on Graphs
author: Yao Ma, Jiliang Tang
comment: Great overview of GNN architectures, very relevant for segger development.

title: The Selfish Gene
author: Richard Dawkins
comment: A classic. Always good to revisit the fundamentals of evolutionary biology.

title: Graph attention networks
author: Veličković et al.
comment: Seminal paper. The attention mechanism is crucial for handling heterogeneity in spatial omics data.
